resources.string: How to earn POINTS to come to the US under Trump\'s immigration plan
Points are also given out for English ability, as determined by standardized English test, Measured by IELTS or TOFEL or any other test.
The only point scale that factors in whether an individual actually has a job offer in the US comes in the form of salary in an effort to boost wages.

There are bonus points available for \"extraordinary achievement,\" mainly reserved for major international awards. The system grants 25 points to someone who has won a Nobel prize or something \"comparable.\"
Fifteen points would be given to someone earning an individual Olympic medal or relatively competitive international sporting event.
An applicant may accrue,for foreign investment under this subsection.

The legal spouse of an applicant under this subsection who is accompanying or following to join the applicant in the United States shall be issued a points-based immigrant visa under this section upon the approval of the parent’s petition. Applicants, if they want to bring a spouse with them, to calculate the points the spouse would earn under the same rubric.
You are eligible to apply ameican visa, if you have more than 30 point then you have more chance to get visa.
You are not eligible to apply american visa, please make sure you have to make minimum 30 points for apply.
